definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Properly smoked and hung, joints of pork would keep well for up to two years.
sentences.chinese: 腌肉或烤肉制作良好的话，像猪后腿可以保藏两年。

sentences.english: Hurdle technology is the essential events of food preservation.
sentences.chinese: 栅栏技术是食品保藏的根本所在。

sentences.english: Meat from New Zealand is frozen and brought to England in special ships.
sentences.chinese: 从新西兰运来的肉被冷冻保藏，用特殊的船运往英国。

sentences.english: Meats, fruits and vegetables can be dried and kept in cloth bags.
sentences.chinese: 干肉，水果和蔬菜可以保藏在布袋上。

sentences.english: I keep all my valuables under lock and key.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的一切贵重物品妥为保藏。

sentences.english: Tomatoes prepared or preserved otherwise than by vinegar or acetic acid.
sentences.chinese: 番茄，用醋或醋酸以外的其他方法制作或保藏的。

sentences.english: It is convenient to use dry yeast because its handling is simple and its preservation easy.
sentences.chinese: 使用干酵母比较方便，因为它贮运简便，也容易保藏。

sentences.english: Some people dig cellars where they keep their potatoes and root vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 一些人把他们的马铃薯和根类蔬菜放在地窖里保藏。

sentences.english: Holotype of the new species is deposited in author's laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 新种模式标本保藏于作者工作单位。

sentences.english: Taxidermy began with the ancient custom of keeping trophies of the hunt.
sentences.chinese: 动物标本剥制术其应用可追溯到古代保藏猎物的风俗。

sentences.english: They also keep well at low room temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 他们还把它放在低温下保藏。

sentences.english: Drying is one of man's oldest methods of food preservation. It is a process copied  from nature; we have improved certain features of the operation.
sentences.chinese: 干燥是人类保藏食品最古老的方法之一。

sentences.english: Type specimen is kept in Mycorrhiza Laborary, Laiyang Agricultural College.
sentences.chinese: 标本保藏于莱阳农学院菌根生物技术实验室。

sentences.english: Therefore, the optimum processing for preserving convenient bacon with Nisin has been determined.
sentences.chinese: 找出了用乳酸链球菌素保藏即食腊肉的最佳工艺条件。

sentences.english: The sterilization and preservation by radiation for dehydrated vegetables got good results.
sentences.chinese: 脱水蔬菜辐照杀菌保藏效果显著。

sentences.english: All the materials cited are deposited in Fungal Collection of Dept. of Plant Protection, College of Agriculture, Guangxi University.
sentences.chinese: 新种的模式标本保藏在广西大学农学院植保系标本室。

definition: flat silver (former coinage)/also written 銀圓|银圆/silver dollar
condition/physical appearance (of a museum piece, item of food produced by a chef, postage stamp etc)
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
